document.full_text: police shot dead a driver on a congested bronx expressway on saturday, after he crashed into several vehicles and tried to run down officers as they approached his car, authorities said.
document.title: police shoot driver after chase on bronx expressway
lines_and_colors: police shot dead a driver on a congested bronx expressway on saturday, after he crashed into several vehicles and tried to run down officers as they approached his car, authorities said.
